title: Guilford Courthouse National Military Park: Accessibility
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Accessibility             Accessibility       Visitor Center The Visitor Center theater, museum, map program room, and restrooms are all wheelchair accessible. The site orientation film and map program are shown with closed captioning for the hearing impaired. A twenty-minute tactile Battle Map program (table top display with audio description) is available for the visually impaired.   Automobile Tour Road The 2.25 mile self-guiding automobile tour is also wheelchair accessible. An in-car narrated CD tour of the park is available for sale in the bookstore. The comfort station (Stop 6) is also wheelchair accessible.    Colonial Heritage Center & Hoskins Farmstead The Colonial Heritage Center (exhibits & and restrooms) are wheelchair accessible. The historic Hoskins Farmstead structures are not accessible.    Nathanael Greene Library The research library is also wheelchair accessible.   Service Animals Service animals are allowed in all areas of the park.
